channel.title: CVE Feed for Cozmoslabs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cozmoslabs -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-36915|2024-09-17T00:30:46.707Z -- cozmoslabs -- profile%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20user%20profile%20%26%20user%20registration%20forms%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Cozmoslabs Profile Builder plugin <= 3.6.0 at WordPress allows uploading the JSON file and updating the options. Requires Import and Export add-on.

item.title: CVE-2024-31341|2024-08-02T01:52:56.223Z -- cozmoslabs -- profile%20builder
item.description: Insufficient Verification of Data Authenticity vulnerability in Cozmoslabs Profile Builder allows Functionality Bypass.This issue affects Profile Builder: from n/a through 3.11.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-5639|2024-08-01T21:18:06.678Z -- cozmoslabs -- user%20profile%20picture
item.description: The User Profile Picture plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Insecure Direct Object Reference in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.1 via the 'rest_api_change_profile_image' function due to missing validation on a user controlled key. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to update the profile picture of any user.

item.title: CVE-2024-5639|2024-06-21T06:58:18.451Z -- cozmoslabs -- user%20profile%20picture
item.description: The User Profile Picture plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Insecure Direct Object Reference in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.1 via the 'rest_api_change_profile_image' function due to missing validation on a user controlled key. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to update the profile picture of any user.

item.title: CVE-2024-31341|2024-06-06T16:18:21.604Z -- cozmoslabs -- profile%20builder
item.description: Insufficient Verification of Data Authenticity vulnerability in Cozmoslabs Profile Builder allows Functionality Bypass.This issue affects Profile Builder: from n/a through 3.11.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-32728|2024-06-06T17:33:57.181Z -- cozmoslabs -- paid%20member%20subscriptions
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Cozmoslabs Paid Member Subscriptions.This issue affects Paid Member Subscriptions: from n/a through 2.11.0.

This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to update the profile picture of any user.
